title: No Bake Superfood Energy Bars
directions: Combine all dry ingredients in a food processor and pulse minimally until all is combined. Donâ€™t over process it, you want there to be chunks of nuts and dried fruit. Remove from processor and set aside in a medium bowl.
Add wet ingredients into food processor or blender and mix until all is combined.
Pour wet mixture over dry and fuse.
Incorporate all the stir-ins into mixture until all is combined.
Spread mixture evenly with preferred thickness into a dish or baking pan and place into fridge.
Once hardened, cut into desired shapes and store in an air tight container in the fridge.
Keep in mind that the texture hardens up quite lovely after being situated in the fridge for a few hours.
ingredients: 1/4 cup dates, pitted and chopped (about 5 or 6 whole dates)
1/4 cup vegan chocolate chips or raw cacao nibs
